title: Client won't open at all, crashes the second I try to open it.
body: Hello, I recently was gonna start playing again after a break with overwatch coming out, but I couldn't even open the patching client as it would crash without opening anything, saying PVP.net patcher kernel has stopped working. I tried reinstalling it, except it wouldn't install at all since to finish the installation it opens the patcher kernal and that still crashed immediately. My computer runs windows 10 and has the necessary specs to run league (can play overwatch witch is much more intensive) so I'm not sure what is causing the problem. Tried installing on both my C and D drives, was wondering if there was any info known on an issue such as this.

replies.body: This kernel error can be caused by security settings preventing th patcher from opening.  You'll want to use the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this fixed up and get in game.  Something as simple as a Windows update could have caused the change, and it's okay!  Let me know if you have any questions!

I'm having the same issue, Old and New client both do this. I can only get on PBE.

-edit
I'd prefer to not redownload if that's the only fix, I like having Item sets and they always reset.
If it's the only fix then so be it.
